article2.title: Hi, I'm Lucas
article2.paragraph1: I am a junior web developer, passionate about web and mobile development. I started learning web development in school at EFREI in 2023. I learned to develop web and mobile applications using modern technologies and agile methods. I gained skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Symfony, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Git, GitHub, and many others.
article2.paragraph2: I am currently looking for an internship and a work-study program as a junior web developer. I am open to all opportunities. I am ready to take on new challenges and learn new technologies. I am motivated, curious, autonomous, rigorous, and I like working in a team. I am also passionate about music, video games, reading, traveling and cooking.

paragraph3.sentence1: I am available for an interview. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions, suggestions, or opportunities. Here is my email
paragraph3.sentence2: . If possible, please put in the subject line:
